content: this cowl shape is based on the knit version of the bandana cowl http //www purlbee com/bandana-cowl/ which i really loved and wanted to recreate in crochet i ve used a up and down stitch for some subtle texture without losing the well-defined shape of the scarf i m really pleased with how this has turned out and looks just as good with a multicoloured yarn like this one or in a plain colour lovely and cosy and won t blow away in the wind or get caught in doors
